page.title: 10Great Bromley:Entertainment.
page.content: Gt.Bromley has plenty of entertainment throughout the year. Each{January},{a pantomime}is held;the rehearsals begin in the summer.This year it will be" Alice In Wonderland". They also have many other events like discotheques for children. Every summer,around{July}7th,there's a special day for Great Bromley.This is when people open up their{gardens}to the public.There is a flower show & a carnival.Farmers show their machinery & let people walk around the farmyards The church has its own{flower show} inside.Children walk from the school in{a procession}.In June,there are cricket matches outside.There are cabaret evenings in the Village Hall with cheese & wine.There are several fetes,the money from which goes to various causes,e.g.repairing the church tower,& the local school.
